package.name: PHP_Compat
package.summary: Provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP.
package.description:
PHP_Compat provides missing functionality in the form of Constants and Functions for older versions of PHP.
Constants: * E_STRICT * PATH_SEPERATOR * STDIN * STDOUT * STDERR
Functions: * file_get_contents * file_put_contents * is_a * scandir * array_combine * str_split * http_build_query

release.notes: This package is in beta while any bugs are ironed out.

Added more components: * str_split * STDIN * STDOUT * STDERR
Made a number of bugfixes. Added replica PHP error messages.
Still in beta until any last bugs are found and removed.

Added more components: * http_build_query * array_udiff
